_header: Saint Luke says in this gospel
_description: Gospel for the Ninth Sunday after Trinity in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte luke saise in þis gospellþat criste to his
                    dissiples gon tell…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…God giue vs grace so here to liueþat he in heuene oure
                    mede vs giue
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt luk telles in þis godspelleÞat ihesu crist þis
                    tale gon telle…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Þat may ressayue vs in til heueneÞe whilk god vs
                    graunte for his names seuene
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica ixa post festum trinitatis secundum lucam (p.
                    245)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Sayne luke says in our gospellþat criste tyll hys disciples
                    gun tellHow a riche man had a grayfeHis rentes leely to
                    ressayfe…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Godd len vs grace swa here to lyffeþat he in heuen oure
                    mede vs gyffe
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
þis es þe gospell of þe nynde sunday (f.
                    103v)

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saint luke sais in þis gospellThat crist to his dissiples gon
                    tell…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…God gife vs grace so here to lyueThat he in heuen oure mede
                    vs gyue. Amen
